Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Dream Hyper Battle Wii

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Dream Hyper Battle Wii
summary: This Japan-only fighting game features characters from the anime Katekyo Hitman Reborn! It is an upgrade/sequel to a PlayStation 2 release.
